mapper.sql:
select o.id, o.order_no, o.cust_name, o.item_no, o.need_num, o.approved_ordered_num, o.produced_num, o.order_status,o.created_by , ifnull(ps.ordered_Num,0) ordered_Num, ifnull(o.need_num - ifnull(ps.ordered_Num,0),0) as waitOrderedNum,o.procedure_name, ifnull(o.need_num - o.produced_num,0) as waitProducedNumNum,o.created_time from t_sale_order o left join (select sum(IFNULL((ordered_Num), 0)) ordered_Num, sale_id from t_sale_order_place where place_status <> '02' GROUP BY sale_id) ps on ps.sale_id = o.id
AND o.order_no like concat("%",#{p.orderNo},"%")
AND o.cust_name like concat("%",#{p.custName},"%")
AND o.item_no= #{p.itemNo}
and o.created_time >= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{p.beginTime}, ' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and o.created_time <= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{p.endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and o.id in
#{item}
and ifnull(o.need_num - ifnull(ps.ordered_Num,0),0)=0
and ifnull(o.need_num - ifnull(ps.ordered_Num,0),0) > 0
order by o.created_time desc
mapper.select:
SELECT o.id, o.order_no, o.cust_name, o.item_no, mis.item_name, mis.bom_no, o.need_num, o.approved_ordered_num, o.produced_num, o.order_status, o.created_by, IFNULL(ps.ordered_Num, 0) AS ordered_Num, IFNULL(o.need_num - IFNULL(ps.ordered_Num, 0), 0) AS waitOrderedNum, o.procedure_name, IFNULL(o.need_num - o.produced_num, 0) AS waitProducedNumNum, o.created_time FROM t_sale_order o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(IFNULL(ordered_Num, 0)) AS ordered_Num, sale_id FROM t_sale_order_place WHERE place_status <> '02' GROUP BY sale_id ) ps ON ps.sale_id = o.id LEFT JOIN mes_item_stock mis ON mis.item_no = o.item_no
o.order_status = '00'
AND o.order_no LIKE CONCAT("%", #{p.orderNo}, "%")
AND o.cust_name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{p.custName}, "%")
AND o.item_no = #{p.itemNo}
AND o.created_time >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{p.beginTime}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND o.created_time <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{p.endTime}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND o.id IN
#{item}
AND IFNULL(o.need_num - IFNULL(ps.ordered_Num, 0), 0) = 0
AND IFNULL(o.need_num - IFNULL(ps.ordered_Num, 0), 0) > 0
ORDER BY o.created_time DESC
